summary: This is a technical email from Apple to an Assistant United States Attorney (AUSA) regarding the secure delivery of encrypted customer data in response to a legal request. It provides detailed instructions for decrypting and accessing the files using GPG software. The document is part of a law enforcement investigation, case number 2019R01059.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: The recipient of Apple's email, to whom encrypted customer data is being provided in response to a legal request for investigation case 2019R01059.

events.title: Apple's Data Production to AUSA
events.description: Apple sends an encrypted file containing customer personally identifying information (PII) to an Assistant United States Attorney in response to a legal request related to case 2019R01059.

keyFacts: Apple provided encrypted customer PII data to law enforcement (an AUSA) in response to a legal request for case number 2019R01059.
The data transfer occurred on September 19, 2019, and required the use of GPG encryption software for decryption, with specific technical instructions provided.
The document demonstrates law enforcement's use of legal processes to obtain digital evidence from technology companies during investigations.
